SamPy.fitting.fits.Gaussian¶

SamPy.fitting.fits.Gaussian(ydata, xdata=None, initials=None)¶

Fits a single Gaussian to a given data. Uses scipy.optimize.leastsq for fitting.

Parameters:
  • ydata – to which a Gaussian will be fitted to.
  • xdata – if not given uses np.arange
  • initials – initial guess for Gaussian parameters in order [amplitude, mean, sigma]
Returns:

coefficients, best fit params, success
Return type:

dictionary
